title: Kopecky Blitzes Longo Borghini on Siena Climb for Her Second Strade Bianche
content:
World champion kicks at 500m from the line for emphatic victory in Siena, Vollering rounds out podium for SD Worx-Protime 1-3.

Read the full article at Kopecky Blitzes Longo Borghini on Siena Climb for Her Second Strade Bianche on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
